text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw | 97% | stars now 14195 → est 37139 (range 37088-37190)
   https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw
2) millionco/react-doctor | 93% | stars now 2423 → est 6276 (range 6251-6301)
   https://github.com/millionco/react-doctor
3) HKUDS/ClawWork | 93% | stars now 3032 → est 10899 (range 10873-10925)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/ClawWork
4) PeonPing/peon-ping | 92% | stars now 2480 → est 4983 (range 4958-5008)
   https://github.com/PeonPing/peon-ping
5) Zaneham/BarraCUDA | 92% | stars now 936 → est 3982 (range 3957-4007)
   https://github.com/Zaneham/BarraCUDA

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
